name: MMCA - Multi-Model Collaboration Agent
description: A sophisticated chat interface that showcases the workflow of a Multi-Model Collaboration Agent (MMCA). It visually separates the outputs of different AI models ([A] Generator, [B] Verifier, [C] Extender) and the final integrated [Agent] response, providing a transparent and traceable user experience. The application also features a memory module to simulate context retrieval and persistence across conversations.
